article_title: Summit Medical Center delays opening to early April

article_metadata.news_keywords: , patient protection and affordable care act, health care, hospital, medicaid, samuel vigneri, summit medical center, dennis jack, trevor graff

og.description: Officials at Summit Medical Center, Casper's anticipated third hospital, announced Monday they will delay the facility's opening until early April.
